ija.game

Class BoardField

  • java.lang.Object
    • ija.game.BoardField
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Field

    public class BoardField
extends java.lang.Object
implements Field
    The class for specifying the aspects of a field on the game board
    Author:
    xquirs00 Gabriel Quirschfeld, xjendr03 Martina Jendralova

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface ija.game.Field

        Field.Direction

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BoardField(int col, int row)
      Initializes the field Sets the figure to null (field has no figure on it at the moment) Creates an array for the neighboring fields

    • Constructor Detail

      • BoardField

        public BoardField(int col,
                  int row)
        Initializes the field Sets the figure to null (field has no figure on it at the moment) Creates an array for the neighboring fields
        Parameters:
        col - the column of the game on which the field is located
        row - the row of the game on which the field is located

      • remove

        public boolean remove(Figure figure)
        Removes a figure from a field
        Specified by:
        remove in interface Field
        Parameters:
        figure - the figure to be removed
        Returns:
        true if figure was removed, false if no figure was on the field or there is a different figure on the field
